statements: SELECT * FROM cost_savings_analysis;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_type FROM cost_savings_analysis;
SELECT vehicle_model, fuel_consumption, miles_per_gallon FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT vehicle_type, electricity_cost, gasoline_cost FROM cost_savings_analysis ORDER BY electricity_cost DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, city_mileage, highway_mileage FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE city_mileage > 25 AND fuel_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_model, fuel_type FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE fuel_consumption > 20 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_model, miles_per_gallon, city_mileage FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE electricity_cost < 100 ORDER BY miles_per_gallon DESC;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE gasoline_cost BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, miles_per_gallon FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE miles_per_gallon > 25 ORDER BY fuel_type, vehicle_type DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, city_mileage, highway_mileage FROM cost_savings_analysis WHERE city_mileage > highway_mileage;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, model_year FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE gas_mileage_mpg > 30;
SELECT vehicle_name, electric_range_miles FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY electric_range_miles DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, model_year, fuel_cost_per_gallon FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, cost_per_mile FROM electric_vehicles WHERE model_year < 2020;
SELECT vehicle_name, model_year, electric_range_miles FROM electric_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, model_year, cost_per_mile FROM electric_vehicles WHERE model_year > 2018;
SELECT * FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE gas_mileage_mpg > 25 ORDER BY model_year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, model_year, gas_mileage_mpg, fuel_cost_per_gallon FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE model_year < 2015 ORDER BY gas_mileage_mpg ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, cost_per_mile FROM electric_vehicles UNION SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_cost_per_gallon FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE cost_per_mile < 0.12;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, cost_per_mile FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, emissions_per_mile FROM vehicles ORDER BY emissions_per_mile DESC;
SELECT MAX(cost_per_mile) AS highest_cost_per_mile FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_type, cost_per_mile, emissions_per_mile FROM vehicles WHERE cost_per_mile < 25.00;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT vehicle_type, cost_per_mile FROM vehicles ORDER BY cost_per_mile DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(trip_cost) AS total_cost FROM trips GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_cost > 1000;
SELECT v.vehicle_type, t.trip_cost FROM vehicles v JOIN trips t ON v.vehicle_id = t.vehicle_id WHERE t.distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY t.trip_cost DESC;
SELECT v.vehicle_type, s.savings_amount, s.timestamp FROM vehicles v JOIN savings s ON v.vehicle_id = s.vehicle_id WHERE s.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT manufacturer, year FROM fuel_powered_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, year FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year > 2018;
SELECT * FROM cost_analysis WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT user_name, comment, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles ORDER BY manufacturer DESC, year ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT manufacturer, year, vehicle_type FROM fuel_powered_vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, total_cost, savings FROM cost_analysis WHERE total_cost > 5000 AND savings < 1000 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, user_name, rating FROM user_feedback JOIN cost_analysis ON user_feedback.analysis_id = cost_analysis.analysis_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, year, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicles WHERE battery_capacity > 40 ORDER BY year ASC, manufacturer ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings ORDER BY cost_saved DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) FROM cost_savings GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year FROM vehicle_details WHERE year >= 2015;
SELECT SUM(electric_consumption), SUM(fuel_consumption) FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, yearly_mileage, last_service_date FROM mileage_history WHERE last_service_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cost_savings WHERE miles_driven > 5000 ORDER BY cost_saved DESC
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year FROM vehicle_details WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV'
SELECT vehicle_id, electric_consumption, fuel_consumption FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY vehicle_id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM mileage_history WHERE last_service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_costs WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 AND maintenance_type LIKE '%engine%'
